field.name: delivery_date
field.help: Date when the supply of the goods and services is performed. You can set this date to when you want ZATCA to recognize the VAT Due Liability, as ZATCA will consider the earlier of this date and the Confirmation Date. In case of multiple deliveries, you should take the date of the latest one.
